display_long_description:
Welcome to the world of PlayPal! Our goal is to create an AI Town where you can live alongside AI Companions (powered by LLM) and delightful 'Pals'.

In this vibrant setting, dive into activities like farming, animal husbandry, and crafting. Begin by managing a farm—raise animals, cultivate vegetables and fruits, and enjoy fishing. As you progress, attract more AI companions to help you develop the island and unlock new town buildings.

Explore the enchanting island to collect adorable creatures known as 'Pals'. You can assign them  to work such as crafting, farming, and industrial production. However, be mindful of their workload, as excessive demands might cause Pals to flee. Ensure their happiness by establishing hospitals, amusement parks, food stalls, beauty salons, and more within the town.

Alternatively, simply relax and chat with AI Companions or play game with them, enjoying support for multiple languages, including English, French, German, Spanish, and Italian.

The game is still in development, with exciting features to come: additional AI Companion characters, a diverse array of charming Pals, the construction of industrial production factories, and teaming up with AI Partners to explore and unravel the island's mysteries!
